text: The mighty Chieftain of the Icefang Tribe has deep frozen ice running through his chaos infused veins.
Mastering the Tundra Tracking skill, Drenok's armies gain heightened visibility in snowy landscapes, allowing for better strategic positioning and ambushing opportunities.
As a master recruiter, Drenok's Glacial Recruitment Prowess reduces the recruitment cost and time for Icefang-specific units, ensuring a formidable army loyal to the Icefang tribe.
Drenok's Frozen Ambitions accelerate the growth and development of the Icefang territories, transforming them into economic powerhouses and bastions of Norscan strength

Drenok leaves a lasting legacy as the Greataxemaster, improving the recruitment capacity and effectiveness of Greataxe units within the Icefang tribe, ensuring a formidable and loyal force for generations to come.
Drenok's Arctic Resilience enhances the hardiness of his forces, reducing attrition and increasing resistance to cold-related hardships during prolonged campaigns in the frozen North.
Drenok unleashes Polar Raider Raids, enabling his armies to conduct swift and devastating raids on coastal settlements, crippling enemy economies and bolstering the Icefang treasury
Drenok's Icy Conquest Tactics provide strategic advantages in frozen battlefields, granting his armies enhanced movement and effectiveness in snowy terrains.
Drenok Johansen extends his influence over the icy lands of the Icefang tribe, increasing economic productivity and public order in the frozen territories under his dominion.
Finally a place where that cold grip of yours comes in handy, Drenok..

Forged in the heart of legend, the Great Axe of the Icefang is a colossal double-handed weapon, a relic passed down through the esteemed ancestors of the Icefang tribe. Its mighty blade bears the weight of centuries, a testament to the valor of a revered ancestor who, with unyielding determination, used the axe to slay a great, white dragon that cast its shadow across the annals of history. The weapon, etched with the frost-kissed tales of that legendary battle, now serves as a symbol of the Icefang tribe's enduring strength and the indomitable spirit of their forebears.
The great sagas of the Norscan tribes tell of a mighty Icefang warrior known as the "Wielder of the Great Axe".
The breath of the ice corrupted whitebear named Frorbjorn could freeze the brightest of flames.
The Giant Ice Wolf known as Frostfang is corrupted by deep chaotic ice, his primal instincts draw him mindlessly to Great Axe of Ice.
Summons the Giant Ice Wolf known as Frostfang
As Drenok raises the ice infused Greataxe, corrupted creatures with ice coursing through their veins hear the call.
As Drenok stomps the ground cracks form with solid black ice piercing through the surface, skewing any unwary foe.
Melee attack: %+n for Ice infused units
Marauder mobs are awarded even greater mobility when riding their crude chariots of bone and wood, lashed together with the guts and sinew of the vanquished.

Creatures infused with chaotic corrupted black ice unravel in a bloodthirsty frenzy when close to the Greataxe of the Icefang.
Ability: "Frozen Fury" for Chaos Frost Dragon untis
Recruit rank: %+n for Chaos Frost Dragon units
Marauders of the Icefang Tribe seemingly put more faith in what they call ''The Great Axe'' than they do in he who wields it.
Ice Storms: Chaos infused hailstorms will be created upon capturing settlements with a Frozen or Chaotic Wasteland climate
Causes attrition to forces within region
Armies will suffer losses due to [[img:icon_attrition]][[/img]]attrition when in newly conquered frozen lands of the Icefang Tribe
A chaos infused Hailstorm is tormenting this region, the army cannot bear the bitter cold!
The essence of the great white Dragon still lingers on the frozen solid blade of the Great Axe.
